articles.title: Iran protests swell nationwide as crackdown intensifies and internet is cut
articles.summary: People tear down an Iranian flag after it was taken down in Mashhad, Iran, in this screenshot from a video posted online on January 8, 2026. SOCIAL MEDIA / VIA REUTERS Iranian protesters on Thursday, January 8, stepped up their challenge to the clerical leadership with the biggest protests yet of nearly two weeks of rallies, as authorities cut internet access and the death toll from a crackdown mounted.
